text.section: Remedies provided by this subtitle are cumulative and do not affect the availability of remedies under other law, including the recognition of a support order of a foreign country or political subdivision on the basis of comity.

This subtitle does not:
provide the exclusive method of establishing or enforcing a support order under the law of this State; or
grant a tribunal of this State jurisdiction to render judgment or issue an order relating to child custody or visitation in a proceeding under this subtitle.
